artist: Author: Ambroise Vollard, Paris, France; Illustrator: Pierre Bonnard; Publisher: Ambroise Vollard, Éditeur, Paris; Engraver: Aimé Jourde, Paris, France; Lithographer: Aimé Jourde, Paris, France
creditline: The Frank P. Leslie Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Frank P. Leslie in memory of Mr. and Mrs. John Leslie
description: Binding: special purple morocco with gilt lettering; endpapers:  specially gilded and colored paper (blues, purples); slipcase: covered with colored paper similar to end paper
medium: Lithographs, etchings, wood engravings, and letterpress; bound volume
provenance: Mr. and Mrs. Frank P. Leslie, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 1967.
title: Sainte Monique
